ygData.subject: Re: which spellcasting class to be?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe, I am at work.  I seem to remember it being 6 last time I checked but it certainly COULD be more! I know it s greater than 6 though...
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe, I am at work. I seem to remember it being 6 last time I checked
but it certainly COULD be more! I know it's greater than 6 though...

Phil Showalter wrote:
>
> From: "Phil Showalter" <phil@...>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: James Dwyer [mailto:jdwar@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 11:13 AM
> To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eq_wizards] which spellcasting class to be?
>
> >From: James Dwyer <jdwar@...>
>
> >To his defense, I am level 20 now and also disillusioned with the wizard
> >class.
>
> (snip)
>
> > Of course hindsight is 20/20 but I've invested over 6 realtime
> >days into my wizard and am too stubborn to give up on him. The spells of
> >the wizard are very limited. Sure we can do the most damage in the
> >shortest amount of time, but it's not THAT much more. But other than
> >that, we can teleport like the druid, and that's all!
>
> This is incredible to me..... I just turned lvl 13 and my played time is 9
> days and 12 hours. Are you doing something special or am I just wasting a
> lot of time?
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Looking to expand your world?
> http://www.onelist.com
> ONElist has over 165,000 e-mail communities from which to choose!
